name: Bird Up: Apocalypse Skateboard Grind Adventure Game FREE
name_original: Bird Up: Apocalypse Skateboard Grind Adventure Game FREE
description: Join B.Blue and his skateboarding Bird friends in an end of the world skate adventure.  The world has been blown to pieces, gravity is out of whack, and birds are now the dominant species of what remains.  Nothing left to do but have a blast!  Skate, trick and grind your way through a staggering variety of obstacles in this endless boarding game.  Time your jumps to be perfect.  Earn coins to unlock new birds with new tricks!  Grab it today and start grinding!
